c1.name: Spring Thunder of Fertility
c1.descriptionRaw: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Blade</color> is increased to 3.
c1.description: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.

c2.name: Violet Vehemence
c2.descriptionRaw: When Falling Thunder created by <color=#FFD780FF>Bellowing Thunder</color> hits an opponent, it will decrease their <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro RES</color> by 15% for 8s.
c2.description: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

c3.name: Distant Crackling
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bellowing Thunder</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Fickle Cloudstrike
c4.descriptionRaw: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Blade</color>, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.
c4.description: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

c5.name: Clamor in the Wilds
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Blade</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: World-Shaker
c6.descriptionRaw: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by <color=#FFD780FF>Bellowing Thunder</color> will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
c6.description: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.
